rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0001
rows.name: Mmm! Mmhmmm! Heeheehee...

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0002
rows.name: You seem to be having fun, Raiko.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0003
rows.name: Hehe. Can you tell?

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0004
rows.name: What's up? Did something good happen?

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0005
rows.name:
What's going on? Did something
nice happen to you?

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0006
rows.name:
What is it? Has something
fortunate occurred?

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0007
rows.name:
What's goin' on? Somethin'
good happen to ya?

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0008
rows.name: Yes, indeed!

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0009
rows.name:
It's just that around here,
there are so many places where
lightning powers are needed...

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0010
rows.name: I feel like it's my time to shine!

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0011
rows.name:
You've been coming along in leaps
and bounds with your powers lately!

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0012
rows.name:
Yeah. If we didn't have you around,
we'd never have made it this far.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0013
rows.name:
That's right, without Raiko,
we couldn't have made it
this far so smoothly.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0014
rows.name:
Indeed, without Raiko, our progress
would have been much slower.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0015
rows.name:
Yeah. If we didn't have you around,
we'd never have made it this far.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0016
rows.name:
Aww, it makes me so happy
to hear you all say that!

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0017
rows.name:
I promise I won't zap
any of you anymore~

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0018
rows.name: How should I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0019
rows.name: Raiko, you've really worked hard.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0020
rows.name:
Don't get cocky, or you
might slip up again.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0021
rows.name: How should I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0022
rows.name: You've really worked hard, Raiko.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0023
rows.name:
Don't get too confident, or
you might mess up again.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0024
rows.name: How should I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0025
rows.name: Raiko, you've really improved.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0026
rows.name: Don't let your guard down.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0027
rows.name: How should I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0028
rows.name:
All that training is really
paying off, ain't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0029
rows.name:
Don't go gettin' too
full of yourself now.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0101
rows.name: Yeah!

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0102
rows.name:
I'm still training hard every day
to better control my powers!

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0103
rows.name:
What sort of training
exercises do you do?

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0104
rows.name: Well, for example...

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0105
rows.name:
I practice generating very mild but
sustained electrical currents.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0106
rows.name:
Or using my powers to give shoulder
massages to elderly folks.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0107
rows.name:
Basically, I'm working
hard to have complete
control over my electricity!

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0108
rows.name: You're really putting in the effort!

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0109
rows.name: Yep!

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0110
rows.name:
Having become a full-fledged
Raiko, I'm now aiming to
become twice as capable!

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0111
rows.name:
In that case, we'll be counting
on you from now on, Raiko.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0112
rows.name:
I suppose we'll keep counting
on you then, Raiko.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0113
rows.name:
In that case, we shall continue to
depend on your abilities, Raiko.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0114
rows.name:
Alright then, we're gonna
be countin' on ya, Raiko!

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0115
rows.name: Yes! I'll do my best!

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0116
rows.name:
Feel free to lean on me
anytime you need to!

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0201
rows.name: Tee-hee! No need to worry about that.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0202
rows.name: I'm being extra cautious these days...

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0203
rows.name:
I absolutely won't shock
other people anymore!

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0204
rows.name: Ah...

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0205
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0206
rows.name: There's a bug on your back...

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0207
rows.name: What? A bug!?

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0208
rows.name:
Where? Where is it!? I can't
stand bugs! Get it off me!

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0209
rows.name:
Hold on. I'll remove
it for you right now.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0210
rows.name: Just a sec. I'll take care of it.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0211
rows.name: Stay still. I'll get it off for you.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0212
rows.name:
Hey, don't move a muscle! I'll
get that critter for ya.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0213
rows.name:
Uh, um... Eek! It crawled
somewhere weird!

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0214
rows.name: Aaaahhhh!

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0215
rows.name: Aaaahhhh!

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0216
rows.name: Aaaahhhh!

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0217
rows.name: Aaaahhhh!

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0218
rows.name: Oh no... I messed up again.

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0219
rows.name:
I'm so sorry... I guess I
still need more practice...

rows.label: kizunatalk075_msg0220
rows.name: I will try even harder!!
